gui.form.base

Class MenuBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.form.base.FormObject
      • gui.form.base.MenuBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChangeSubject, java.lang.Comparable<FormObject>

    public class MenuBar
extends FormObject
    A class that represents a menu bar on which clickable menuHeaders reside.
